location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink on paper.Dimensions: 192 x 244, on paper 203 x 330mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map of Jebel Tubaik [Jabal aţ Ţubayq, Saudi Arabia], with three coloured lines depicting routes around the eastern edge of the mountain range. The lines begin north-west of Ma'aizila [Al Mu‘ayzīlah] and descend south, ending just to the west of Nuqra al Hamra [Nuqrat al Ḩamrā’]. The map provides some indication of relief.
